name: Simple Code Insert Shortcode
author: Lodel Geraldo

sections.description:
This is very useful for embedding videos, images, banner ads, and etc.

The best thing about this plugin is that you only use shortcodes in order to display everything you want.

Example Shortcode:

[scis id=”1″ align=”center”]

Align Parameters: left, right, and center

Thank you for using SCI Shortcode Plugin for WordPress. I hope this plugin will provide you with useful functionality.

-Lodel Geraldo-

Compatibility

SCI Shortcode Plugin requires PHP 5 and WordPress 3.3.1 or higher.

Thank you

That’s all – I hope that you’ll like my plugin. Any suggestions, questions and other feedback will be welcomed on developersnoteofficial@gmail.com

Sincerely yours,

Lodel Geraldo
sections.installation:
The installation is simple. You can download the .zip file and upload it via WordPress Admin Panel (Plugins -> Add new -> Upload).

Activate plugin via (Plugins -> Installed plugins -> Simple Code Insert Shortcode -> Activate).

After installing the plugin, you can now add entries and use the plugin as how it works.

short_description: SCI Shortcode Plugin for WordPress allows you to insert or embed codes in posts, pages, and sidebars.
